description: This is an inactive protectron. Use this item to reprogram and activate the protectron. If it works, youll have a friend for life.

use_action.friendly_msg: The protectron gets up and salutes you with it's little robotic arm!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the protectron; it's hostile!

description: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Activate it for a patriotic radio.

use_action.friendly_msg: after a short boot sequence, the eyebot stirrs to life and begins its patriotic tunes.

description: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on to tune into Radio Freedom.

use_action.friendly_msg: after a short boot sequence, the eyebot stirrs to life and begins its somber violin music.

description: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on to tune into Radio New Vegas.

use_action.friendly_msg: after a short boot sequence, the eyebot stirrs to life and begins to play Johnny Guitar.

description: This eyebot looks like it'll work. Turn it on for a dose of GNR, featuring Three Dog!

use_action.friendly_msg: after a short boot sequence, the eyebot stirrs to life and Butcher Pete starts to play.
